import Mathlib

open Set

/--
Exercise: Assume that f is a continuous real function defined on (a, b)
such that f((x+y)/2) â‰¤ (f x + f y)/2 for all x, y âˆˆ (a, b). Prove that f is convex on (a,b).
-/

theorem Rudin_exercise_4_24 {a b : â„} {f : â„ â†’ â„}
  (hcont : ContinuousOn f (Ioo a b))
  (hmid : âˆ€ x y âˆˆ Ioo a b, f ((x + y) / 2) â‰¤ (f x + f y) / 2) :
  ConvexOn â„ (Ioo a b) f := by sorry

import Mathlib

/--
